name: Life Having Left Me
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44 (Life is currency)

What is life to you?

Something to buy and sell.
A thing to protect.
Retribution.

Play as a merchant in the Halfworld which lies between life and death. Purchase and sell items between two cities for profit, and battle monsters between the areas. There is only one resource to manage: your life.

--

Web build and Windows build provided.

--

Made with:

Jake Crabtree

Ali Kedwaii

Jeff McMillen
